Facade engineering

  • Home
  • Facade engineering

Façade and metal construction

Façade and metal construction

With our expert knowledge, we accompany you in the planning of façade construction, metal construction and steel construction. We support you in every phase of the project, be it in design and development, but also in execution and workshop planning.

Design development

  • Consulting
  • Draft planning
  • Cost estimate

Project support

  • Scope of construction
  • Approval planning
  • Workshop planning

Execution support

  • Support of material purchasing
  • Supervision of production and assembly processes
  • Cooperation during completion and handover

Your 2D drawing or 3D model can be read directly into the statics software. By reading in a wide variety of formats such as DXF, DWG, IFC, STEP files and others, misunderstandings can be avoided and efficiency increased for everyone

Get a quote
